Iowa Ruby Brigade

A user group for Ruby and Rails enthusiasts.

February 2008

Thursday, February 21, 2008

6:00 - 7:30 PM

Speakers

Ryan D. Hanks
David W. Body / Big Creek Software, LLC

Topic

What's New in Rails 2.0?

Ryan and David will cover the significant new features and changes from Ruby on Rails 2.0, which was released in December 2007 after almost a year of development.  We'll basically follow the outline in the announcement post, and we'll provide code examples and live demos illustrating the major changes.  We'll also discuss effective migration strategies for Rails applications developed under previous versions of Rails.

O'Reilly Books

O'Reilly has donated some books for us to give away at the meeting.  To be eligible to win one, you must be present at the meeting and be on our mailing list.

Meeting Location

DMACC West
5959 Grand Ave
West Des Moines, Iowa

We meet in the main auditorium on the second floor.  Wi-fi Internet access is available.

Map (DMACC West)

Dinner After the Meeting

If you can, please plan to join us for dinner at a local restaurant after the meeting.

Iowa Ruby Brigade

The Iowa Ruby Brigade is a user group for Ruby and Rails enthusiasts.
